alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 11:02PM MST until November 25 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Guadalupe County. * WHEN...Tonight. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com. Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.
